attributes.action: amend vehicle lighting regulations to prohibit the use of blue lights of any kind on vehicles other than 999 service emergency vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blue lights are usually associated with emergency vehicles only, yet it is currently permissible for any vehicle to display some types of blue light. This can confusing, especially at night. The use of blue lights of any kind on vehicles should be restricted to the 999 emergency services only.
